title: Experiment
description: Schema for submitting metadata for an assay.
comment: Experiment is the main organizing object for metadata on a single assay, it's associated protocols, files and subsequent analyses.

description.title: description
description.description: A short description of the experiment

experiment_type.description: A controlled term specifying the type of experiment.
experiment_type.title: Experiment Type

experiment_variables.title: Experimental Variables
experiment_variables.description: Items that can vary between experiments and may be different from the reference protocol

files.title: Data files
files.description: Information about the data files associated with the experiment.

filesets.title: Sets of Metadata on Data files
filesets.description: Information about a set of data files associated with the experiment.

items.title: Fileset
items.description: Metadata on a set of files.

related_experiments.title: Related Experiments
related_experiments.description: Related experiments and how they are related to this experiment.

items.title: Related experiment
items.description: An experiment that is related to this experiment with a specified type of relationship.

internal_status.description: The status of an experiment in the DCIC process.
internal_status.comment: unreviewed:wrangler has not evaluated, unrunable:experiment requires more metadata to run, pipeline ready:experiment is ready for the pipeline, processing:pipeline is running, pipeline completed: pipeline has run through completion, requires lab review:there are QC concerns about this data, release ready:DCC feels that this is ready for release
internal_status.title: Status
